Do not miss out on this opportunity, get in contact with us today!

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877252412. Balance of 3 year unlimited kilometer service plan.
Balance of 3 year unlimited kilometer warranty.
Infotainment system with Bluetooth, Android Auto and Apple Car Play.
Cruise control, anti-lock braking system, airbag, central locking, electronic brake distribution, air-conditioning, power steering.
SHATTER ALL PRECONCEPTION WITH MAZDA2
The Mazda2 shatters the preconception that a car’s value is proportionate to its size. With the latest high-level safety features, the Mazda2 shatters every preconception you hold, break out into freedom and experience effortless joyful driving. We offer in house finance.
We do a 101 quality check on every vehicle and we do Roadworthy upon delivery.
We offer in-house finance with all major banks.
Pictures are for illustration purposes only.
T's and C's apply.
Errors and omissions Reserved.

attributes.description:
Welcome to the King of Cars Group

King of Cars has more than 15 years of experience in the motor industry and offers over 200 professionally evaluated vehicles. We offer advice & assistance to clients, from financial solutions to the smart way to buy / sell your vehicle. 

We also offer a ‘Breaking Borders’ approach. We can start the application process online or telephonically, complete the entire sale this way and even deliver the vehicle to your doorstep anywhere in South Africa. We’ll help you make the car of your dreams a reality.  

Contact or visit our showroom today!

Please Note: Administration, delivery and license and registration fees are not included.
